description: Interviewed on the set of the film version of Thornton Wilder's play 'The long christmas dinner', the principal players in this film are asked to compare the advantages and disadvantages of acting for film and for the stage. Although not all the actors interviewed agreed, most concur that acting for film presents a special challenge. Cast includes David Soul and Andrew Robinson.
